Class SmartThiefPath

java.lang.Object

public class SmartThiefPath extends Object

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      method that checks if there's a valid move between 2 tiles before adding to queue
      Parameters:
      x1 - the x coordinate of the current tile
      y1 - the y coordinate of the current tile
      x2 - the x coordinate of the desired next tile
      y2 - the y coordinate of the desired next tile
      Returns:
      boolean, whether the move can be made or not
